entity.description: US Representative from New York Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

text: @AOC THERE IS NO BLACK AND BROWN COALITION. STOP USING BLACK SUFFERING TO PUSH YOUR ALL LATINO AGENDA. Black Americans will get our Reparations, we don't need people like you muddying the waters with NONSENSE. And yes BLACK Americans have been DENIED #COVID19 Testing.
